summary: This is an internal email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY) dated July 27, 2019, discussing upcoming events for the week, including a pretrial conference for Jeffrey Epstein and a meeting between the prosecution team and defense attorneys where the defense has a proposal to present.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the upcoming pretrial conference and the case being discussed by the prosecution team.

events.title: Pretrial conference in Epstein case
events.description: A scheduled pretrial conference for the Jeffrey Epstein case at 11 a.m.

events.title: Prosecution-Defense meeting
events.description: The Epstein prosecution team is meeting with the defense attorneys, who have a proposal to present.

keyFacts: An internal SDNY email schedules a pretrial conference for Jeffrey Epstein on July 31, 2019.
The prosecution team planned to meet with Epstein's defense attorneys on July 29, 2019, to hear a proposal from them.
The email is dated July 27, 2019, shortly before Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.
All sender and recipient names in the email are redacted, indicated by placeholders like (USANYS).
